response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to you. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations, is priced at $750,000. Our goal is to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, and we believe this offer strikes the perfect balance between value and affordability. We look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we can make this product a reality for you.", "product_price": 750000}
